SELECT co.id, ca.product_type,co.name, co.image, co.common_description, MIN(va.price) as price FROM shop_component co JOIN shop_component_variant va ON co.id = va.component_id JOIN shop_category ca ON ca.id = co.category_id
and co.category_id = #{categoryId}
and co.name like concat('%',#{searchContent},'%')
GROUP BY co.id
